[Burning Bridges](/burningBridges/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |body = Mataru Clothing |weapon1 = Quarterstaff (Deadfire){{!}}Quarterstaff |internalname = NPC_PM_Ikawha |guid = c9e5251f-cf45-4676-aaec-da4a6db08f49 }} '''Storm Speaker Ikawha''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background {{Description|Seated upon a chair before the bonfire, Ikawha looks considerably more comfortable here in her home village. She prods absently at the coals with a long stick. Ikawha's lined face is pocked with fading scars, but there's no hostility in her calm appraisal as you approach.}} The head of the Huana living alongside the Vailians of [Port Maje](/portMaje/), Ikawha is one of the few holdouts who refused to ally themselves with [Queen Onekaza II](/queenOnekazaIi/) of [Neketaka](/neketaka/), who united most of the Huana tribes under a single banner. While this gives her a degree of flexibility, it also weakens her negotiating position with the Vailian governor. Ikawha's lined face is pocked with fading scars, but she's far more soft spoken and polite than her exterior would have people believe. She gets along with the governor fine most of the time and believes that he might actually enjoy the island if he wasn't a slave to his Vailian masters. In fact, she is a strong supporter of close ties with the Vailians at Port Maje, especially if Clario can keep his VTC overlords away. That way, everyone can be happy... Except for [Mokeha](/mokeha/), her daughter, whose patience is strained by the alliance every single day. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [Stranded](/stranded/)
[Burning Bridges](/burningBridges/) |none = |other = * You can discuss the matter of the storms with her and use [Perception](/perception/) 12 to point out that the damage done at the village is minor or [Insight](/insight/) 2 to point out that she and the governor don't get along. * You also get an unique interaction with her as an [island aumaua](/islandAumaua/) from the Deadfire. * Stealing from the basket behind the totem while in plain sight will cause her to ask you to put it back. Typically the contents of the basket will [Hardtack](/hardtack/), not coinage as she describes. You can respond by ** Putting back {{cp2|10}} ** [Sleight of Hand](/sleightOfHand/) 2 to pretend to return the coins ([Shady](/shady/)) {{topic|Skulduggery}} ** [Bluff](/bluff/) 2 to deny that you stole anything ([Shady](/shady/)) ** Or pocket the coins, though this doesn't have any reaction. {{topic|Irresponsibility}} }} ## =Quests = * [Stranded](/stranded/): Her village will help move your ship after you assist [Clario](/governorGiascesClario/). * [Burning Bridges](/burningBridges/): She can help you solve the problem between [Rinco](/rinco/) and [Mokeha](/mokeha/).
